task.title: How to create bullets in a Microsoft Word document.
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to create bullets in Microsoft Word.

prereq.p: Your Word Application have to be installed on your device and you have to have a Microsoft Word document on which you can work on.

context.p: This task can insert bullets for listing different types of things.

step.cmd: Select the text you want to make bullets for it.
Right click on the text and press the bullets option.

result.p: The selected text is bulleted successfully!

example.p: This can help you when you want to list different types of things in the text!
